title: Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems shall be installed in the buildings for Hospitals, Hotels, Guest Houses, Police/Army Barracks, Canteens, Laboratories and Research Institutions, Hostels of Schools and Colleges and other Institutions
clause_text: Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems shall be installed in the buildings for Hospitals, Hotels, Guest Houses, Police/Army Barracks, Canteens, Laboratories and Research Institutions, Hostels of Schools and Colleges and other Institutions.
section: Special Provisions; for installation of Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems.
